chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Haral Luhhan, p. 17 [4]—Blacksmith of Emond's Field. His arms are as big as most men's legs, and his chest strains his shirt. He is the tallest man in the Two Rivers. Master Luhhan has recently aquired a new apprentice in Perrin Aybara. His wife, Alsbet, is almost as large as he is. He sits on the Village Council. See also Aybara, Perrin; Luhhan, Alsbet.
